description:
The Twilights and Ton head to the Tower of London, a treasure trove of Umbra, in order to save Shinyao. The Twilights face off against the countless Umbra Haysin has prepared for them. Meanwhile, Wayne and Ton find Shinyao, but she has transformed, having already absorbed many Umbra. Shinyao mercilessly attacks her friend Ton. Wayne is struck while protecting Ton. As Ton attacks Shinyao, a man thought to be her enemy comes to her rescue: Van Helsing.
Source: crunchyroll
